QuestData.Title: Gryth Thurden
QuestData.Description: Here are the honorary cleavers for Gremlock's students. If you've already been to Kharanos, then you should fly a gryphon back there!$B$BTake the cleavers to our gryphon master, Gryth Thurden, and speak with him about a ride back to Kharanos.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Honorary Cleavers to Gryth Thurden in Ironforge.
QuestData.CompletionText: You look like you have somewhere to go. Need one of my gryphons?
QuestData.RewardText: You have to get these to Kharanos, eh? That won't be a problem. As long as you've already been to Kharanos and spoken to Brolan Galebeard, then you can take one of my gryphons back to him.
